page.title: 05Transport in Kingswood.
page.content: In our area are two{"A" roads,}the A 4017 and A 4715. Both run north-south taking traffic from the{motorways north of{Bristol}to{Bath}and {Southampton.}Both are narrow and twisting. There is a very sharp corner at the bottom of Teewell Hill where it crosses the line of the closed {railway.}Lorries en route to the motorway have great difficulty negotiating the bend and long{traffic queues occur. A{ring-road}has been promised for more than fifteen years. Serving as a major{route}round{Bristol East}it will go through fields in our area destroying the natural habitat of local wildlife. It is certainly needed and will bring relief to the residents of Kingswood.
